attributes.action: Delay the deadline for exemption on xlBully form as it’s to short notice
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government and parliament to think properly about the ban and extend the form for another 2 months as it’s unfair on the people who have good loving dogs but simply do not have the funds to do so as of yet chritmas has only just ended and we haven’t been given enough time to prepare for the ban I’m speaking on behalf of all bully owners here don’t take our baby’s and give us more time to get everything sorted or give people who claim uc or pip help with the form as it’s unfair
attributes.background: Give people a extra 2 months to sort there exemption form for xl bully’s as chritmas has only just been and cost of living crisis has hit the roof which is causing distress in families who want to keep there pet and need more time to do so as this isn’t fair on how short notice it is for the public

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Delay the ban on rehoming and owning XL Bully dogs for 18 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650474
